mdRecord.dcterms:title: Photograph of Congressman Moore at the Tenth Young Republicans National Convention
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Congressman Arch Moore, Jr. (second from left) attending the Tenth Young Republican National Convention in Washington, D.C. One of the highlights of the convention was the election of Congressman Moore to the Young Republican Hall of Fame. Mountain State Delegates shown with Congressman Moore are Barbara Caldwell, Jean A. Saul, Catherine Raptis, and Charles A. McWhorter, Jr., National Young Republican President.
